page.title: 03Local Employment
page.content:
Most of the inhabitants of the area except those involved in farming in the rural areas either{commute}daily into the city of London where they are mainly employed as buisness-men for one of the large oil companies
{OR { teach at one of the{schools}in the surrounding area (comprehensives and public schools)
Recently a Computer firm (Logica) have moved into the area and have begun employing local people. However, the bulk of their employees come from outside the area.
There is very little unemployment within this area.
